tool.name: Autocorrelation test
tool.description: check for temporal autocorrelation in the residuals
tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
========================== Model residuals autocorrelation check ==========================
This tool is an implementation of the autocorr-res_acf function from `RegionalGAM package: https://github.com/RetoSchmucki/regionalGAM/ This function uses a simple linear model and explore for temporal autocorrelation that we will account in the final model.
